name: BMO Canadian Bank Income Index ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeks to replicate, to the extent possible, the performance of a Canadian banks financing index, net of expenses. Currently, the ETF seeks to replicate the performance of the Solactive Canadian Bank Income Index the Index.  To achieve investment objective the investment strategy of the ETF is to invest in and hold the constituent securities of the Index in the same proportion as they are held in the Index. The Manager may also use a sampling methodology in selecting investments for the ETF to obtain exposure to the performance of the Index.
fulldescription: The ETF seeks to replicate, to the extent possible, the performance of a Canadian banks financing index, net of expenses. Currently, the ETF seeks to replicate the performance of the Solactive Canadian Bank Income Index the Index.  To achieve investment objective the investment strategy of the ETF is to invest in and hold the constituent securities of the Index in the same proportion as they are held in the Index. The Manager may also use a sampling methodology in selecting investments for the ETF to obtain exposure to the performance of the Index. As an alternative to or in conjunction with investing in and holding all or some of the constituent securities of the Index, the ETF may invest in or use Other Securities to obtain exposure to the performance of the Index
fullAddress: 43rd Floor, 100 King Street West, Toronto, ON, CA
